statements: SELECT id, location, temperature FROM WeatherData;
SELECT location, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData;
SELECT location, precipitation, last_updated FROM WeatherData;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, location FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC, temperature DESC
SELECT location, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 70 AND wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT id, location, precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE precipitation BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.5 ORDER BY location DESC, precipitation ASC
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 80 AND wind_speed < 5 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT location, date_trunc('hour', last_updated) AS last_updated_hour FROM WeatherData WHERE precipitation > 0 ORDER BY last_updated_hour ASC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, difficulty_level FROM AdventureActivities WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT id, activity_name, activity_type, recommended_weather FROM AdventureActivities WHERE recommended_weather IS NULL;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE location = 'California' AND temperature < 25;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM AdventureActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Hiking' AND difficulty_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY id
SELECT id, activity_name, recommended_weather FROM AdventureActivities WHERE recommended_weather IS NOT NULL AND difficulty_level = 'Advanced'
SELECT location, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 20 OR humidity > 70 ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT id, location, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, date FROM activities WHERE location = 'Park' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY location;
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS alert_count FROM alerts GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY alert_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT id, activity_name, activity_type FROM activity_data WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_data ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT alert_message, timestamp FROM alert_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 70
SELECT wd.location, COUNT(ad.id) as num_alerts FROM alert_data ad JOIN weather_data wd ON ad.user_id = wd.id GROUP BY wd.location
SELECT ud.username, ad.alert_message FROM alert_data ad JOIN user_data ud ON ad.user_id = ud.id
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT location, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT location, forecast_date, high_temperature, low_temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-12-01';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM excursion_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT location, high_temperature, low_temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT location, alert_type, alert_message, alert_date FROM alert_logs ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM excursion_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT activity_name, location, activity_date FROM adventure_activities WHERE location = 'Mount Everest' ORDER BY activity_date;
